title: My phone home screen showing temperature in Celsius but actually it's set to Farenhit. Any solution
content:
My phone home screen showing temperature in Celsius but actually it's set to Farenhit. It's worked after uninstalling Google app it worked correctly. In past I sent many mails or feedback to Google and never received response.

Does anyone know solution?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
